document.full_text: beneath the rebels' public-relations effort, the war in libya is, like any other, attended by all sorts of human behaviors, many of them self-serving and removed from the revolutionaries' ideals.
document.title: at war: military small arms & libya: security puzzles, and profiteers
lines_and_colors: beneath the rebels' public-relations effort, the war in libya is, like any other, attended by all sorts of human behaviors, many of them self-serving and removed from the revolutionaries' ideals.
